topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f90fcd6368725c5a2d0100#post_54f90fcd6368725c5a2d0100
Mostly because we only have our own race as a reference points, and historically, when different civilizations come into contact with one another, they inevitably try to kill one another at some point.

Of course, if an alien species could traverse the stars, they would also most likely have a means to utterly annihilate our race long before we could ever pose a threat to them or before we could even become aware they existed. But then that wouldn't make for very exciting television, now would it?
topics.author: 5043cdb47f123b72cc0032d3

topics.body:
"@ParagonCommander":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f910226368725dc2470200#post_54f910226368725dc2470200
If a AI/sapient species were to judge *EVERY* human based upon the actions of the few that would be irrational and stupid.

If we were to meet a sapient race of aliens then chances are they would be forgiving of all our wars and shit cause there's a high probability that if life is abundant in the universe that a fair number of those species had a period in their development which had wars and such.
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f910686368720411770100#post_54f910686368720411770100
I'd like to see a movie where the twist is that the aliens just want to fuck. . . wait that's pretty much everything to do with Captain Kirk.
